meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unpleasant to look at.
meanings.sent1: The unsightliness of the old building made it hard to sell.
meanings.sent2: The unsightliness of the graffiti on the wall was a constant eyesore.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unsightliness, the quirky sculpture had a certain charm.
meanings.sent4: The unsightliness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The unsightliness of the abandoned house was etched in their memories.

meanings.definition: Something that is unattractive or ugly in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The garden was marred by the unsightliness of the wilted flowers.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the unsightliness of the stain on her favorite shirt.
meanings.sent3: The unsightliness of the mismatched socks made her chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The unsightliness of the cracked mirror reflected her shattered emotions.
meanings.sent5: The unsightliness of the abandoned car in the field stood out against the greenery.
